flawed_nl_solution:
On Monday, Mrs. Watson grades 120 x 60% = <<120*60*0.01=72>>72 final exams.
At the end of Monday, she has 120 - 72 = <<120-72=84>>84 exams left to grade.
On Tuesday, she grades 84 x 75% = <<84*75*0.01=63>>63 final exams.
On Wednesday, she has 84 - 63 = <<84-63=21>>21 exams left to grade.
#### 21

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 48, not 84. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
